JavaApi.RandomDataGraph
Class RandomGraphAPI

java.lang.Object
  JavaApi.RandomDataGraph.RandomGraphAPI

public class RandomGraphAPI
extends java.lang.Object

The Java API that implements the logic and algorithm of the GRR system (see relevant paper and documentation)

RandomGraphAPI

public RandomGraphAPI()
Method Detail

construct

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model construct(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                                                 java.util.ArrayList<QueryWrapper> qWrappers,
                                                 INaturalNumberSampler nSampler,
                                                 ConstructionPattern cPattern,
                                                 IMatcher matcher,
                                                 QueryOptimizationMode mode,
                                                 ExpLogger expLogger)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
Construction Command (without dynamic queries) For more information please review the GRR documentation

Parameters:
model - - The model which will be used for querying and updating
qWrappers - - Ordered Array-List of QueryWrapper instances which represent the queries and relevant query meta-data needed for execution
nSampler - - The number-sampler used to define how many times to create the pattern
cPattern - - The actual construction pattern used
matcher - - The matcher matches the pattern to the different results returned by searching the pattern in the model (mapping between existing nodes to nodes in the pattern itself
mode - - The query optimization mode to be used
expLogger - - Internal class used for performance monitoring. Users should pass null here
Returns:
- The updated model
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Currently throws a generic exception in any case that the recursive construction failed

constructDynamic

public com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model constructDynamic(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                                                        java.util.ArrayList<QueryWrapper> qWrappers,
                                                        java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryAttributeVariableMap,
                                                        INaturalNumberSampler nSampler,
                                                        ConstructionPattern cPattern,
                                                        IMatcher matcher,
                                                        QueryOptimizationMode mode,
                                                        ExpLogger expLogger)
                                                 throws java.lang.Exception
Construction Command (with dynamic queries) For more information please review the GRR documentation

Parameters:
model - - The model which will be used for querying and updating
qWrappers - - Ordered Array-List of QueryWrapper instances which represent the queries and relevant query meta-data needed for execution
queryAttributeVariableMap - - A mapping of attributes to query variables to be used in resolving the actual values of dynamic variables
nSampler - - The number-sampler used to define how many times to create the pattern
cPattern - - The actual construction pattern used
matcher - - The matcher matches the pattern to the different results returned by searching the pattern in the model (mapping between existing nodes to nodes in the pattern itself
mode - - The query optimization mode to be used
expLogger - - Internal class used for performance monitoring. Users should pass null here
Returns:
- The updated model
Throws:
java.lang.Exception - - Currently throws a generic exception in any case that the recursive construction failed

constructRecursive

public void constructRecursive(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                               com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model tempModel,
                               IQuerySampler[] qSamplers,
                               INaturalNumberSampler nSampler,
                               ConstructionPattern cPattern,
                               java.util.ArrayList<com.hp.hpl.jena.query.QuerySolution> solutions,
                               IMatcher matcher,
                               int index,
                               QueryCache qCache)
                        throws RdfNodeExistsInModelException,
                               java.io.IOException
The recursive version of construct (without dynamic variables)

Parameters:
model - - The model which will be used for querying and updating
tempModel - - The temp work model which will be updating and finally merged into the original model
qSamplers - - An ordered array of query-samplers that will be used
nSampler - - The number-sampler used to define how many times to create the pattern
cPattern - - The actual construction pattern used
solutions - - Array-List of QuerySolutions that will be used for mapping the actual model and the pattern that defines how to create and update the model
matcher - - The matcher matches the pattern to the different results returned by searching the pattern in the model (mapping between existing nodes to nodes in the pattern itself
index - - The recursion depth (matches the depth of the query being executed
qCache - - A wrapper for all of the query-caching operations
Throws:
RdfNodeExistsInModelException - - Thrown in case that we are trying to create a duplicate node
java.io.IOException - - Thrown in case of an IO failure (e.g. usage of files to load dictionary-samplers)

constructDynamicRecursive

public void constructDynamicRecursive(com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model model,
                                      com.hp.hpl.jena.rdf.model.Model tempModel,
                                      IQuerySampler[] qSamplers,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryAttributeVariableMap,
                                      java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> queryAttributeResultMap,
                                      INaturalNumberSampler nSampler,
                                      ConstructionPattern cPattern,
                                      java.util.ArrayList<com.hp.hpl.jena.query.QuerySolution> solutions,
                                      IMatcher matcher,
                                      int index,
                                      QueryCache qCache)
                               throws RdfNodeExistsInModelException,
                                      java.io.IOException
Parameters:
model - - The model which will be used for querying and updating
tempModel - - The temp work model which will be updating and finally merged into the original model
qSamplers - - An ordered array of query-samplers that will be used
queryAttributeVariableMap - - A mapping of attributes to query variables to be used in resolving the actual values of dynamic variables
queryAttributeResultMap - - A mapping of attributes to actual results returned from queries that will be used in the next queries (dynamic variables) and in the final creation command
nSampler - - The number-sampler used to define how many times to create the pattern
cPattern - - The actual construction pattern used
solutions - - Array-List of QuerySolutions that will be used for mapping the actual model and the pattern that defines how to create and update the model
matcher - - The matcher matches the pattern to the different results returned by searching the pattern in the model (mapping between existing nodes to nodes in the pattern itself
index - - The recursion depth (matches the depth of the query being executed
qCache - - A wrapper for all of the query-caching operations
Throws:
RdfNodeExistsInModelException - - Thrown in case that we are trying to create a duplicate node
java.io.IOException - - Thrown in case of an IO failure (e.g. usage of files to load dictionary-samplers)
